title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.21 - Identification of student pilots
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.21 - Identification of student pilots

State Regulations

Pilots holding a student pilot certificate issued by the

Federal Aviation Administration shall at all times identify themselves as
student pilots upon initial radio contact with the airport's air traffic
control tower or when transmitting their intentions on the radio within the
airport traffic area during periods when the airport air traffic control tower
is closed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
